summary: can be found in the solitude blacksmith
descriptionHtml: this armor can be found in the solitude blacksmith and is based of of a dragur armor, the helmet has water breathing the ring had health regeneration, the necklace has fortify health the gauntlets have fortify stamina, the boots have stamina regeneration, the armor had 100 percent resistance to poison and the sword has a 25 point health absorption and has a charge of one million so it will almost never run out.
author: marcusroberts1
